/hr/grafana.github.io-helm-charts-loki-s.title: loki helm release
/hr/grafana.github.io-helm-charts-loki-s.name: loki
/hr/grafana.github.io-helm-charts-loki-s.doc: Loki is a log aggregation system that aggregates logs from various sources, such as Kubernetes, and makes them available for search and analysis. It uses a label-based approach to categorize logs, making it easy to query and retrieve relevant logs. The system is designed to be horizontally scalable, highly available, and multi-tenant, making it suitable for use in a variety of environments, including home labs.

/hr/oci--ghcr.io-prometheus-community-ch.title: kube-prometheus-stack helm release
/hr/oci--ghcr.io-prometheus-community-ch.name: kube-prometheus-stack
/hr/oci--ghcr.io-prometheus-community-ch.doc:
kube-prometheus-stack is a Helm collection that deploys:

  • Grafana for dashboarding
  • Prometheus as metric database, together with an operator to manage it.
  • kube-state-metrics for exposing k8s metrics
  • prometheus-node-exporter for exposing node metrics
  • alertmanager for setting up alerts based on metrics or logs

Overall, kube-prometheus-stack is comperehensive and heavily configures all the tools.
